name: Moon Spirit
description:
For the best experience, please download the desktop build.

Moon Spirit is a story where you explore the mystical and mysterious world of the moon. You play as a fox spirit, with the ability to glow and activate a source of light to guide your way. Sit back and relax as you make your way into the glowing, beautiful atmospheric world.

Control:

  • WAD / Arrow Keys: Move
  • Spacebar: Interact

I made all of the assets inside this game during the jam, including the music. However, there were some extremely helpful third-party resources and tools that I should mention here:

  • Aseprite
  • God rays - Godot Shaders
  • Picster's particle textures
  • Deep-Fold's space background generator
  • and lastly, tons of helpful Godot tutorials I've watched.

This game was made and submitted for the GoGodotJam2 jam.
